website_summaries.verdict: TiVo Roamio OTA is an excellent DVR, but its monthly fee structure makes it too expensive for people cutting the cable cord. The standard TiVo Roamio is a better choice overall for cord cutters.
pros: The TiVo Roamio is an exceptionally polished DVR for recording free over-the-air TV
The interface is excellent and intuitive, making it dead simple to record shows and series exactly the way you'd like
It has built-in Wi-Fi and a 500GB hard drive
The superb remote works via RF, so you can hide the box behind a cabinet
And the hardware itself is compact, sleek and silent
cons: Despite the $50 upfront cost, the Roamio OTA becomes expensive when you add in subscription costs -- and because it sorely lacks a lifetime option, you'll pay subscription fees forever
It's not compatible with CableCard, so unlike with the standard TiVo Roamio you can't choose to upgrade to cable service later
And there should be more streaming services at this price, like HBO Go, Vudu and a fully functioning Amazon Instant app

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. Noisy. Worthless warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 4 months (but more than 90 days) after I got this device the hard drive started making all kinds of noise. I contacted TiVo and they told me to restart the device. After 5 restarts the noise was gone, but I explained to TiVo that I was concerned the hard drive was bad. They told me it was out of warranty (which is only 90 days), but I could buy a new box from them for $50 off. Rather than throw good money after bad, I just kept the first one. Five months later it's making all kinds of noise again and restarting hasn't helped this time. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShopper

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying buzzing sound.
customer_reviews.text: It makes this super loud buzzing noise which is just at the right frequency to drive you absolutely crazy. I'm always unplugging it to make the buzzing stop. You can hear it throughout my entire house. Since I unplug it, it's worthless as a DVR. When I googled this problem, a lot of other people complained about the buzzing, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: ... trying for 1 week now to set up this stupid thing. It gets stuck on the last step ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying for 1 week now to set up this stupid thing. It gets stuck on the last step the "verification" step. Multiple calls to TiVo and no one can fix it, they act like they know how, but in the end nothing works. . Never need so frustrated with something. Piece of junk! Customer service sucks . So much for my hopes of cutting the cord! It's not worth thus much frustration.
customer_reviews.author: ewres

customer_reviews.title: Major channel identification problems.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is great. Recordings of recognized channels are also great. What isn't great is the database Tivo is using for local channels. One local channel is misidentified as NBC when it is clearly Fox. Even the program descriptions are Fox listings. Then there is a local CBS station that is identified with the proper call letters, but TIVO doesn't identify it as CBS, so no listings, which means I can't make recordings. Doesn't that kind of defeat the purpose of this unit? I don't know where TIVO gets their listings, but they need to up their game a lot. Several emails to customer service have gone unanswered. Great hardware, lousy schedules and non-existent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Cleworth

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: If you want to cut the cord and still have the ability to record and to stop what you're watching on TV this is the device to get there is no subscription fees with this particular model and the guide is up-to-date the step-by-step directions with the device are easy to follow once you have got the device hooked up with the service that you call Tivo to activate the device you're ready to go when using this for three weeks and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rock

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is only as good as the company that stands behind their product. When it works, it works well. When the fan inevitably breaks (a common problem), Tivo will want a $49 charge from you and a $399 deposit from you until you send the old one in, with no exsceptions. All of this is while it is under warranty. It's not the right way to treat a customer.
customer_reviews.author: AndiDenver

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and more!
customer_reviews.text: All I was looking for was a way to record OTA TV automatically and keep track of all my shows and when they start/end. Not only does it do this it has many more useful features (comercial skip, 30 second skip, etc....) Although I hear some of the apps have issues (mainly Hulu) this doesn't bother me as I have many other devices that I will use before this for all my app needs. The only cons i could find are the following. -Weak tuner (compared to my built in Samsung) -App support is barely existent, would like to be able to use the CBS app in conjuntion with my OTA channels. Overall, well worth the 300+ this unit costs
customer_reviews.author: Eclipse01

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Will not activate. Tivo says its a known issue without a resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Technical support says this is a known issue and there's nothing they can do about it at this time. Their suggestion: wait. So I have a $399.99 boat anchor until the undetermined date when the issue is resolved. I expected much more of Tivo.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Beasley

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The unit has a software bug that cuts off optical audio after exiting standby mode. Clearly a software bug. Customer service forcing me to get replacement hardware before they do anything. A complete waste of time. Multichannel sound is NOT supported on HDMI either, only 2 CH PCM. I replaced a Channel Master OTA DVR with this and it is complete crap that I have to suffer through this.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it for anyone planning on cutting the cable.
customer_reviews.text: Still exploring the use of the devise but so far I am impressed with what it does. Over the air reception is limited here but we do have all the channels we had been watching & now have it linked to my Amazon Prime plus other streaming services. Recording & playback options are superior too. I like the additional information you can read or links to u-tube for more information about a program, cast or other programs in a series. I will never go back to cable or other paid services. I made the right decision in cutting my cable service.
customer_reviews.author: C Terry

customer_reviews.title: Need help with the USA.
customer_reviews.text: I've asked for help setting this up. However they shut down at 5:00pm my time so a call was cut off. Another was looong and unproductive. Was supposed to receive a call from someone to help me yesterday at 11:00am. I'm still waiting.... 36 hours later. I think it's probably a simple fix that my non-electrically talented mind can't grasp. Not happy with this product so far. Would really like help from someone in the USA that I can understand. If not resolved soon it and the TiVo Mini will be sent back for refunds.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Flawed software makes good product fail
customer_reviews.text: Works but has flaws. Software updates usually add value. And TiVo does send down useful updates that make the box better. But some updates cause grief. Recently, A software update made it so you have to watch a pre-roll ad before viewing your recorded show. What? The update failed and caused my box to re-boot. I had to call support to get this fixed and was told it would be 3 days before my TiVo worked correctly. Now, my signal strength indicator doesn’t work. Come on TiVo, get your act together.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's fan is failing....
customer_reviews.text: My fan is failing in the unit. Based on research, they last somewhere between 3 months to 1.5 years. Google it and you will find plenty of blogs. Look at the tons of purchases for fans on Amazon. Most people are buying and replacing the fan themselves. Can't believe a company would not step up and provided the replacement fan to those who brave to replace it themselves.
customer_reviews.author: dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super awesome and changes the way we can watch television. It was not as difficult to set up as most people make it seem it just requires a little intuitive common sense. My biggest problem is that I've had it for 4 months and it's making a buzzing noise like the fan or the hard drive is going to crash and I am not very happy about that. Customer service for this thing is virtually non-existent and is exceptionally frustrating otherwise I would give it 5 Stars just for the service that it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far it's an expensive paperweight
customer_reviews.text: After 5 hours trying to get the TiVo setup I am going to start with a 1 star review. Repeatedly getting an error it can't find information for my zip code. I have tried several zip codes from a major metropolitan area. Googling the problem shows this has been an extremely common issue for at least a year and clearly not resolved(seems it has nothing at all to do with your zip code). Sadly there is no consistent fix to the problem and all suggestions so far have not worked for me. From what I can tell TiVo support is useless on the issue also but I will give them a shot tomorrow before sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: OTA DVR - Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: TiVo Roamio OTA DVR is awesome! If you are looking to drop expensive cable TV providers & their crazy equipment fees, yet prefer not to give up the convenience of a DVR, this is the best option on the market. Order the "lifetime subscription unit" thus no monthly fees. Ordering through Amazon.com, I had to call TiVo Customer Support to activate. Was easy to activate, took about 20 minutes. I like this navigation better than Comcast and SO MUCH cheaper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim P01

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful purchasing this product. The quality is very poor. The company knows there is fan noise and just two days after my 90 day exchange the fan starting making a very loud noise. You will pay for parts and shipping if something needs replacement. I paid a premium for this unit and my expectations are not met. I own a channel master and plan on never buying a tivo again!!
customer_reviews.author: MJCNAZ

customer_reviews.title: DVR local OTA channels without the cable bill or other fees!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes, if you recently 'cut the cord' but still feel the need to never miss one of your shows that are OTA, this is the ticket! Tivo guide is great, and setting up recording options if fairly straightforward. Paired with the most antenna for your needs or can afford such asand we're pulling in over 30 useful channels and depending on atmospheric conditions the wife still doesn't miss her shows while saving $150+ each month. We are still learning the nuances, like how to get it to stop recording the same show on multiple channels, but overall this is a great device. Best of all, no monthly fee :)
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Failed after six months.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product, but six months to the day after I bought it, the unit failed. TiVo has offered to replace it for $50, which is some consolation, but given that the unit barely lasted six months, this is not very promising. As of right now, it won’t turn on all the way and makes some very loud noises when we try to use it. Really less than pleased with this purchase now, considering how much I paid for it. Be aware that the warranty lasts 90 days before you decide to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Defective remote - super short warranty.
customer_reviews.text: A few months in we realized that our remote was consuming batteries super fast, as in we would have to replace them once a week. It took us a while to realize that it was the remote, and not the batteries. The remote is constantly draining the batteries despite not being used, thus the rapid battery depletion. We contacted TIVO support, and the 90 day warranty had been surpassed but just barely. They wouldn't do anything, so are only option is to buy another 45 dollar remote. Based on some internet searching, this is apparently a known issue. Not great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Munger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I can record off-the-air TV and I'm saving $100 a month! It was a little hassle putting up an antenna since I don't live close to a major city, but I got it figured out. I get several networks and 6 channels of PBS. My cable company upped my internet speed and they offer an app with several decent channels. I love being able to record and watch later. I can pause the TiVO but I can't pause my wife.
customer_reviews.author: barkingcows

customer_reviews.title: One of the best DVRs I've ever used but either has an engineering flaw ...
customer_reviews.text: I had it for about 6 weeks before the internal fan developed an annoyingly loud noise. The fan noise is constant even when the unit is not active. It's clearly the most prominent noise in the room, above the refrigerator, the Roku, the laptop and the desktop PC which has three 4 inch box fans. I returned the unit to TiVO who promptly sent a replacement that after 1 day developed the same issue. NOT ACCEPTABLE. One of the best DVRs I've ever used but either has an engineering flaw or incorporates some inferior components. I would send this thing back for a refund in a minute if that was still an option.
customer_reviews.author: Tp52

customer_reviews.title: Thanks TiVo and Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new TiVo Roamio OTA. My first attempt to cut the cord was with a different brand which I couldn't use. After getting the TiVo, I realized, by comparison, how much better the TiVo is. The commercial skip feature couldn't be any easier to use. Being able to control power, volume and mute with the same remote simplifies things, also. I am still adapting to the remote. It is very efficient, but also a bit complicated. Programming TiVo to record TV series is also a plus and I guess all the options for different activities are necessary. More time should make me comfortable with all the many options available with TiVo.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Cut Cable TV
customer_reviews.text: Great Way To Cut Cable TV 1 I should have done this years ago!! This TiVo Roamio OTA 1 tb is the perfect solution for cutting the TV cable along with purchasing a good outdoor HD antenna. A free guide from TiVo is included and it works great! With the 1tb unit you have capacity for recording 4 programs at a single time and 150 hours of HD programming capacity for storage. My wife and I save $130.00 a month removing the cable TV but still paying for high speed internet. We highly recommend the TiVo Roamio OTA 1tb HD-DVR.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJim

customer_reviews.title: the OTA feature is great, and I love the fact that there is ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a while, the OTA feature is great, and I love the fact that there is no monthly fee as with other units. The streaming side of this while convienient is poor. When I stream Netflix through the TiVo Ota, it comes in very poorly, when I stream it on my Apple TV 3rd gen, it looks great. Same internet, same cable, same login. The other issue with his unit is that the cooling fan is very loud. Noticeably loud, replacement fans are expensive and it's really a pain to get to to replace. Through research I have found this to be an issue with this unit across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Noisy cooling fan
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked great for only 2 months. Now the cooling fan runs constantly! I contacted TiVo within the 90 day warranty period, but of course they just try to get you to follow simple steps, like unplugging the unit for 15 minutes. This still didn't resolve the issue. There is no "quiet" room wherever this unit is located! Such a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: JR in WV

customer_reviews.title: TiVo got it right!
customer_reviews.text: This TiVo is a little expensive but worth it. I decided to cut the cable with all of their charges and fees but still wanted the option of recording my favorite TV shows and this box does it all! It does take a little time and experience to use the remote control that is not completely intuitive, it does takes a little extra time to get use to using it but worth it. In Boise, ID I receive over 40 off the air channels! Yeah, it surprised me too.
customer_reviews.author: soundguy

customer_reviews.title: 2 bad units in a row - Waiting for manufacture support.
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased two of these and the fan has started making a very loud noise after about a month of use. I returned the fist through amazon, second one is more than a month and amazon won't take it back. Will update if the manufacturer supports their product.
customer_reviews.author: pghuser

customer_reviews.title: sucks, but the only game in town
customer_reviews.text: crashes a lot. the first one died, then they dropped the price on me by 100 bucks. freezes. most of the time, it mistakes one click on the remote for 2. so it jumps all over the place. the ONLY reason we got this is because we ditched cable, and needed a guide of channels we could see on the tv. my wife uses it to record shows, but if it were only me, i would have taken it out and shot it. many times
customer_reviews.author: ken inn

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in cutting cord from cable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY TIVO!!!!!! We decided to finally cut the cable cord, however the dvr was my favorite feature. I treated myself to the TiVo so I could tape the shows l like, pause live tv and skip through commercials. The TiVo exceeded my expectations! The guide is great, because free tv doesn’t have one and you get spoiled with the guide on the cable box. The Netflix button is awesome and easy to use for us technically challenged. We are able to access all tv features with one remote. All in all, one of the smarter purchases I have made!
customer_reviews.author: jak

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it as TiVo said the product was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it as TiVo said the product was a stolen box & it would take 2 weeks to reset it, after an investigation. I sent them all the Amazon receipts to prove I purchased it brand new, but after 3 weeks & not hearing from TiVo, I just returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: John Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars, I would. Just returned the second box. Neither would complete the initial setup. After going through the first time, box goes into a continuous reboot cycle. TiVo technical support is a joke. "Reboot and let it sit for two hours" is absolutely no help.
customer_reviews.author: T. Heavner

customer_reviews.title: Needs Internet Connection to Start
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. User interface is great, with nice easy-to-use programming, channel blocking, program recording, iconography, etc. 2. Picked up more channels than my Channel Master DVR+. Cons: 1. No way to power off the unit without unplugging, then it goes through a complete reboot each startup, which takes several minutes. 2. I need to use without a constant internet connection, and if no internet connection, unit freezes during reboot and refuses to turn on completely (black screen after initial boot up screen). Deal breaker for me, especially after spending almost $400.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Cut the TV service provider cord!
customer_reviews.text: Practically set itself up! Paper and online directions are very clear. I bought an antena you affix to a window. I used an HDMI cable, not included (which is really needed). Online activation didn't work, said it was already activated. I finally had to call in, it went smoothly after the call. Glad I bought the 1Terrabite R. Won't have monthly TV service provider bills, just the cost if the internet. We see 2 weeks of programming on the guide.... we can access our Netflicks account from the remote as well as our Amazon account, reception and recording are great. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Therese V2

customer_reviews.title: Good DVR, Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The TIVO DVR service is great for cord cutters, and the Roamio has great potential. Unfortunately, TIVO customer service ranges from atrocious to non-existent. The cooling fan in my Roamio started getting really, really loud after about 60 days. Initial customer service call confirmed the issue and offered to exchange if I provided credit card info as security. Ten days later my card was charged twice, still no replacement. After 3 additional calls and an "Executive Service" confirmation call, still no resolution. Eventually the charges on my card were reversed, but I still have a very noisy device that is about to reach the end of the 90-day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: ocallagdan

customer_reviews.title: Refurbed Romio - know problem=hassle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from WeaKness thru Amazon. After 6-weeks of use the fan got very noisy. This was annoying + I worried that if the fan failed, the HD would fail. WeaKnees referred me to Tivo to get replacement. Had to pay $375, refundable upon receipt of crappy 1st Romio. Guess what? 7-weeks later fan on this one started sounding like a mower. WeaKnees would not allow return & refund. They helpfully explained that the Romio fans were notorious for this -know problem - and that they'd be happy to sell me a replacement fan for $30 bucks. Why was this know prob not fixed when the Romio was "refurbished?"
customer_reviews.author: Karen Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Tivo quality even better than I remember
customer_reviews.text: I've been "Tivoless" for years and really missed it. Back when DirectTV let you own their equipment I had 5 Tivo receivers and they were a joy to use. After suffering the last few years with Comcast products I'm happy to have cut the cord and be back with Tivo. Setup took minutes and hookup took even less time. The operation is snappy and as simple as can be. The two week TV guide makes recording shows a breeze. The unit is small and quiet and tucked easily into my cramped entertainment stand. If you are going OTA, Tivo cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: BubbaMill

customer_reviews.title: Sold as "new", but had been used.
customer_reviews.text: Although the Tivo was sold as new and the box sealed, the unit was obviously not new. There were fingerprints all over the outside, the batteries had been left in the remote and the unit had been programmed by someone. Settings were already chosen, and this made my setup much more difficult. It does appear to be working properly now, but when paying for "new" you expect to get just that. This was most likely not Amazon's fault since the box had been sealed up, but still disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TheGipper

customer_reviews.title: Huge Mistake, Horrible Picture Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst device purchase I've made. Horrible picture quality despite excellent antenna signal strength. Tuned to the same station: Broadcast reception on television antenna input is clear and uninterrupted, while picture from Tivo unit is broken and fragmented. The unit itself is loud, the fan never shuts down. There is no way to turn this thing off without unplugging it. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: rma

customer_reviews.title: Great features, SUPER ANNOYING COOLING FAN.
customer_reviews.text: I love the features it offers, but like MANY others have complained about, the fan noise is SUPER ANNOYING!!! Have tried multiple times to get it fixed but it still keeps buzzing. I wish I could give this 5 stars for how good this item is, but the fan noise is really negatively impacting the overall score. Technology like this should have a better system for avoiding this kind of annoyance/distraction.
customer_reviews.author: MJ48

customer_reviews.title: The interface is stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my media center PC. I use it with an over-the-air HD antennae to DVR and use the Netflix & Amazon apps regularly. The interface is stable and easy to use. Very happy with it overall. Only complaint is that I only have about 5-channels that I use for DVR so I filtered out all of the other crappy channels picked up by the antenna...this makes for a very clean interface when looking at the guide; however, for some reason, the TiVo has twice lost my filtering setup and I have had to redo it. Other than that minor inconvenience, it is a very well thought-out and reliable unit.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Amazon stands behind products
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received would not work. No green light, nothing. I wasted hours thinking it was something I was doing wrong in the installation. I finally called the company and learned the product was defective. I then contacted Amazon, returned the DVR to the company and ordered another one. It took a week to arrive, but installed easily and has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan makes otherwise good unit a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: These units work nicely, but have a very noisy fan. This is my second unit. I replaced my first one for a bigger hard drive, but both of them have a fan that sounds like it is rubbing against something. Fan starts out silent, then becomes noisy very early in the life of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Sallee

customer_reviews.title: Hardware should be better for this price
customer_reviews.text: Would be five stars if they had not shorted the hardware. Software is good. The TiVo mini recommends a MoCA (coax-internet) connection to this box, but the Roamio does not include this capability. That costs extra. The Roamio also left out the hardware to stream directly to your wireless devices. That costs extra. They really should not have shorted the hardware for the amount of money being charged. I would probably have built my own boxes if I did it again.
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have saved my money and found another device to invest in. Its nice to be able to record and rewind but not for $400 and with present technology. I wish I would have saved these $400 for a smart TV and a less expensive recording device. I often have interruptions and most importantly I have connectivity and usability issues with the Apps that come with it, specifically Netflix. I am looking into getting an amazon Fire Stick to be able to watch Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Love this TiVo
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this TiVo unit for people like me who have "cut the cord". All the great features of a regular TiVo with no monthly cost. Pair it up with a good antenna and you're all set - it gives you the program descriptions of all the over-the-air channels it pulls in (with your antenna).
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT OTA recorder - Love our TIVO Roamio!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about TIVO Roamio! There's no monthly subscription fee for us over-the-air users, which is perfect. We can go directly to Netflix and Amazon Prime (among others) from our TIVO Roamio. It can record all instances of a program, new shows only or new and repeat shows, without having to search for each one, by scheduling a "One Pass", which we use daily. If we are out and have forgotten to schedule a recording, I can set it up from my Android phone -- a great feature. The "skip" feature for some of the major channels works great at skipping commercials. All in all, we LOVE our TIVO Roamio and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jodeg

customer_reviews.title: Usability a step down from Premier
customer_reviews.text: User interface is confusing. There's now a high-level menu that requires me to press a number on the remote to pick from a list. That's bad. Also, there are these big images that pop up on the bottom of the screen unexpectedly and undesirably. Coming from a TiVo Premier where things made sense, this is a step downward in usability. Also, I was unable to log into my Amazon Prime account. Tried half a dozen times and I know I was entering my password correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Cut Cable but Still Record Shows
customer_reviews.text: Initial units hard drive went out before end of 1st month. However, the seller sent free replacement with recommendation of using UPS due to sensitivity of TiVO hard drive. So got UPS and on-top TV unit stand. Working for 3 months no issue. Only issue have is with TiVO software. I get free cable without need of cable box and is provided by Dish Network. However TiVO’s program guide does not support satellite providers even if they don’t have a dish. So had to use alternate guide provider and manually setup recording (e.g. by channel & time) versus program name
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice user interface, voice commands, four tuners and no monthly subscription service.
customer_reviews.text: The TiVo OTA Roamio functions well. It has a nice on-screen user interface, voice commands through the remote, and four tuners to record four shows at once. It also has pre-installed apps for the most popular streaming services (Netflix, Hulu and others). The program schedule subscription service that one normally pays TiVo is included with the Roamio, which sure beats having to pay a monthly fee for the service. Excellent replacement for the cable DVR we previously rented from the cable company. The money I am saving by cutting the cord will pay for the TiVo in four months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service at Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for 93 days then the fan got noisy... Tivo finally agreed to replace it I had to front the money first which was OK.... Then the quit was nightmare trying to return the old one 4 hours of phone calls trying to get a shipping label... So many false statements from customer service and two trips to FedEx still haven't been able to return old tivo to get a refund. Tivo needs to train at Amazon on customer service and exchanges... The 4 hours of phone calls I have been on hold for 3...DO NOT BUY TIVO
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Worst gadget/company I've ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely ever leave bad reviews, but I've had a terrible experience with this product. After only 4 months the unit started just randomly rebooting over and over. I called Tivo, and after a TON of frustration with their terrible customer service, they sent a new unit. That 2nd unit worked for one day, then did the same thing. So they sent me a third unit, same thing. At this point Customer Service finally decided to send me a new power cable, but they sent the WRONG ONE. Now, over a month later, I still have a non-working TIVO. Their customer service is clearly overseas, so good luck getting the help you need. I will never buy another TIVO again.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: mong the best. I've been a Tivo fan for many years
customer_reviews.text: We have assumed command -again! Of all the potential solutions, I found this to be a!mong the best. I've been a Tivo fan for many years, first generation (pre-ATSC) and was really fond of the Tivo way of tv life back then. Now, its just nuts. If I were to complain about anything, it would be the quality of the synopsis' in the directory. Some channels are not well depicted. For example, old Star Trek episodes lack any synopsis beyond a boilerplate description -no specific episode information (or season/episode ID). minor issue but a bit lame.
customer_reviews.author: metrology dufus

customer_reviews.title: Great Device!
customer_reviews.text: I love this TIVO - it's got speeded up play, four tuners so you never miss anything, commercial skip ability, the features are all great. Other reviews have mentioned a difficult registration process - but when I did this in late October 2016 it took just a few minutes - very easy. One thing I haven't figured out how to do yet, is if I'm watching say two live football games at the same time (easy to do if you skip commercials and jump ahead between plays) - how to pick up on one channel where I left off and switch back and forth. There's gotta be a way to do this but I haven't found it yet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: TiVo is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I think things have improved as I didn't have any issues with activation like some reviewers said they did, it went smooth and easy. As for the TiVo itself well I think it's awesome for cord cutters like me, and with no monthly fee I was sold. This is my second roamio, the first one had the monthly fee but died after a series of power surges, which also killed my surge protector. One piece advice though, be careful of heat from other devices, give your TiVo lots of room to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Damon459

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these--one refurbished unit in November 2016 directly from Tivo and one from Amazon early last month (April 2017). I've had Tivo DVRs since 2004 and they have all been excellent--functional, reliable and FAR better than the cable company DVRs. These are the best yet. They replace two older Tivo's that were costing me almost $250 in subscription fees each year. I cut the cord in 2015 so I no longer needed cable capable Tivos and the OTA units fit the bill when the annual subscription for the older Tivos rolled around. I did get the three year extended guarantee. In three years, they will have more than paid for themselves. I strongly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: RickA

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Recently I cancelled Directv after having it for 12 years. I was in withdrawal as I loved their software, ease of use etc. However the constant price increases and crazy charges for the boxes etc caused me to cut the cord. I started with an indoor OTA antenna but shortly thereafter longed for recording capability as I normally don't watch anything live. I hate paying monthly fees so the Tivo Romio OTA was just the ticket. Love the commercial skip, the interface is easy to navigate and the streaming really comes in handy. The guide is great also. Love this box !
customer_reviews.author: Jose Del Greco

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why it adds 2 of every channel ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why it adds 2 of every channel. It has a weaker tuner than the onboard TV tuner so that is upsetting because I can't record some of my preferred channels. It's not worth the $400.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Tivo setup looping he!!
customer_reviews.text: Going on 4 days since I opened this box and I STILL can't use this BRAND NEW piece of equipment!! It is stuck in setup looping hell! And all Tivo can say is "we're aware of the issue and are working on it". I find that totally unacceptable! I've given them 24 hours to have the fix done or I will be returning it and getting something else!! I'm looking at the Channel Master but it seems to have their share of issues as well. Anyone have suggestions??
customer_reviews.author: klf2717

customer_reviews.title: great product and a must have for cord cutters.
customer_reviews.text: A little frustrating getting it set up. Unplugging it and starting over does wonders. Greatest thing for antenna tv since basic cable 20 years ago. this a must have if you have cut the cord especially if you get a good antenna signal! I have over 50 shows recorded and I have had this only a couple of months. If you cut you cable cord then your saving enough to buy this rather pricey must have item and once you start using it you will understand why I say it is a must have item. It is like power door locks once you use them it is hard to go back to analog.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Painfully noisy fan
customer_reviews.text: A loud, buzzy, harsh fan destroys any pleasure that I might otherwise get from using this device. Also, despite TiVo's claims, it will not work as a remote player for a TiVo Bolt. This is one of my most-regretted tech purchases of the past year, and I really wish that I hadn't let the return period go by.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Burke

customer_reviews.title: Fan went out after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Fan crapped out after one year. Being somewhat handy, I simply bought a cheap replacement. I would suggest buying the extended warranty. Also I notice that the price has gone waaaay up. Here's my original order; TiVo Roamio OTA 1 TB DVR - With No Monthly Service Fees - Digital Video Recorder and Streaming Media Player - Compatible only with HDTV Antennas (does not work with cable) Sold by: Amazon.com Services, Inc $349.99
customer_reviews.author: Dreams-of-Hobbits

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: TiVo was better than I thought. I purchased it as part of our cable cutting plan, wanting to be able to record certain network shows. I was very impressed with the interface and the relative simplicity is using TiVo. The two things I really love are 1. The ability to skip commercials in some recordings. 2. To display my Netflix and Amazon shows as if they were recorded. It makes is extremely easy to select the next episodes without having to log into each app separately.
customer_reviews.author: arquad

customer_reviews.title: It really seemed like the perfect product I wanted but for some reason ...
customer_reviews.text: It really seemed like the perfect product I wanted but for some reason it would not recognize one of our major channels by pressing the channel number button but it would go to it if I used the up or down channel arrow button. Signal strength was nearly the same as the other channels. Tivo sent a replacement unit but it did the same thing so I returned both for refunds. I wish it would have worked as we liked all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: Roamio OTA is an excellent device for viewing and recording over-the-air TV shows
customer_reviews.text: Roamio OTA is an excellent device for viewing and recording over-the-air TV shows. It also has apps for several internet based entertainment sites such as Netflix and Amazon Prime.The remote is versatile, but misses a couple of features. For instance you can set it up to control the volume and mute on a receiver, but it doesn't have the ability to turn the receiver on and off, so you still have to use the receiver remote. The included lifetime subscription to the TV guide is great. The unit needs a way to add apps. There is no support for Directv Now, for instance.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Love the unified show experience
customer_reviews.text: Love that we can follow a show (they call it "season pass") -- and have a unified viewing experience, so I see over the air recordings (DVR) blended with streaming options (from Hulu / Netflix / Amazon). Once those links are setup it's pretty easy going and a really nice viewing experience. We opted for the Roamio OTA model without a subscription, figuring if I needed to sell it later, it would be an easier transition to someone keeping the "all-in" costs easy to understand. But we love it - no plans on shopping for a better DVR... even with our 4k tv, I didn't see a compelling reason to look at the "better" TiVo model(s).
customer_reviews.author: D. McIver

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cord Cutters.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great, if you don't have cable but use netflix, amazon prime, and hulu, along with mlb.com, its an amazing deal. I'm hoping that it will eventually support playstation vue as well because their network coverage is spotty for most people. I also have a tivo bolt and as long as they are on the same MOCA network, you can record and watch programs on both items. I got the bolt because I wanted the option to use cable or not, which this item does not do. I will say this though, if you are the kind of person that wants to get out of the cable rat race, this is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Drue J. Deshotels

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: This has been a disappointing experience, first one arrived defective, elected to return for a replacement which also turned up and is defective. Now I can’t select any option but return for a credit, I just want a refund. Something wrong if 2 of these arrive defective.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With TiVo Roamio OTA with 1 TB Disk
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and intuitive setup. Very pleased with the interface, the tactile feel of the remote and the ease of configuration. I considered the Channel Master but chose TiVo Roamio OTA for 3 reasons - (1) 1TB internal hard disk was part of the package as was, (2) built-in wifi that discovered my 5.0 ghz network with ease and, (3) ability to set record for a show over a season vs. having to do it every week. This was the clear choice over Channel Master for a no-fee DVR cable-cutter solution for local broadcasts.
customer_reviews.author: bs

customer_reviews.title: It works and requires a few free hours to set up
customer_reviews.text: It is currently working connected to an antenna. The same input to the TV receives more channels and the ones received were clearer on the TV. On the other hand it does record and once you get familiar with the operations it works. The original setting up took several hours and at the end it still did not work so call support who were closed for the day. Had to call the next day and spend another hour going through the setup steps for the upmteenth time and finally unplug and then reboot the box, then it worked. Finally there is no power off switch which I guess is a feature.
customer_reviews.author: bobb2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought this for us as a gift, since we were still recording our favorite shows on a VCR. (Yep, we are way in the dark ages...lol!!) This is FANTASTIC! Able to record multiple shows and saves them all unless you want them deleted. I love that I can catch our favorite shows when we aren't able to watch them live. And the FF option to fast forward the commercials is so great. I love my new TiVo....and with no monthly subscription, the Roamio is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: matthew McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and love it. It allows me to record shows on CBS, ABC, NBC, Fox, etc. so I can watch them at times that are more desirable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Makes cord-cutting easy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Tivo - not having the added monthly/yearly service convinced me to go with Tivo over Tablo. I really like the one search, the Commercial Skipping, and the easy of working with Tivo. This has been a great help in cord cutting! My only complaint is that I wish it had more apps available, however, I did get the FireTV to supplement this box.
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it. I read reviews on Amazon about the nightmares getting Tivo registered under your name, I did not want that stress so I put off ordering it. Finally, had to order it as I gave up cable and the fall shows were starting. Received the Tivo on Sunday. Called to register it. No problems and I had it programmed and up and running Sunday. Have not missed my shows, records what I want and even Tivo suggests some show. Tivo has suggested some Spanish shows and I do no speak Spanish but no biggie, we are getting to know each other. Again, love it.
customer_reviews.author: barbara cardoza

customer_reviews.title: OTA tuner is awful
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking box, easy to set up and great interface. However the ota tuner is terrible, could not maintain even the strongest signal. Could only pull in 3 of the over 15 stations that I get very well with my iview 3500 and even those 3 keep cutting in and out. Also keeps rebooting for no reason. I am very dissapointed I was looking for a good OTA dvr
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I was a fool...
customer_reviews.text: For hanging on to Comcast for as long as I did. Makes their DVR seem like a VCR. More features, better remote, better menus; it's decades ahead. I do wish the remote had at least one more programmable button for audio power and maybe a macro or two. Had to reboot once after a storm, but no big deal. Seamless with Netflix, plug the antenna into it rather than the TV and switching to live is easier. "No monthly charge " for the Tivo service (won't work without it) just means paying up front, and break even is less than two years.
customer_reviews.author: LittleFaster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cord-cutters
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cord-cutters. Easy to set up. Classic TiVo interface. I've had the TiVo for several weeks as I write this. I live in Atlanta, so there are a number of stations that I receive OTA. I have not had cable or satellite for about 4 years now. So I thought I'd see if broadcast TV improved any... it has not. (this is no way a bad reflection on TiVo or the product) However, there are some sporting events that I cannot get via streaming, so this is a good, albeit slightly pricy addition. But with no monthly fees, it is a one-time cost that opens up options.
customer_reviews.author: gotJeep?

customer_reviews.title: Wife loving the Tivo
customer_reviews.text: Been looking at similar "less expensive" DVR solutions for my over the air antenna. After looking at some, much more equipment was needed, a subscription to the guide was needed, and it all added up to the same price or more. Tivo just works and the guide is very easy to get acclimated to.
customer_reviews.author: Treyathlete

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to set this up for 3 days but it wouldn't connect with my Wi fi network. Bad choice! I sent it back for a refund. I hope others have better luck than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hollis

customer_reviews.title: For all potential cord cutters out there!
customer_reviews.text: All the other 5-star reviewers have it right! This is the best OTA DVR out there especially for those of us looking to cut the cord. LOTS of memory-- more than what we had with Uverse that's for sure! Experimenting with a mix of Netflix, Hulu, Sling tv and Amazon Prime. Sports was the biggest deal for us. You can't dvr sling tv sports broadcasts at the moment, so we'll have to see if all these platforms plus a digital antenna can cover the bases where that's concerned. Easy to use the TiVo. No issues installing and setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not new. It was a returned product.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be new, but it was a returned product. Previous purhaser’s ID could not be removed so that I could set it up for my use. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It took some time to get it set ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I honestly don't know why I've had traditional cable for so many years. Combining this service with PS Vue, Netflix, Hulu, ect checks all the boxes required to have a full cable experience, without the bill. The shows come through clear and I love that everything can be recorded and saved for later. I also LOVE the integration with the other paid apps (Prime, Hulu, Netflix, VUDU) which allows me to seamlessly look up shows that I've recorded, as well as shows available on my various streaming services. This thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: With the demise of the VCR I was looking for some way to record/keep/time shift commercial TV broadcasts. I had looked at DVR's in the past but always shied away because of the recurring monthly subscription. When TiVo offered the lifetime subscription it made the purchase acceptable (albeit it at significant cost, at least I know what the costs are). And, boy howdy, this device is worth it. I had no idea what the capabilities of this machine are - it just continues to amaze. I have been so impressed, I even purchased a Mini for the bedroom - not because I needed it, simply because it is so AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: tlbrad774

customer_reviews.title: Great device - it really improves TV !
customer_reviews.text: I love the unit and system - its very user friendly but my setup was a real pain. Actually reminds you you can skip the commercial when you get to it !! I have a smart Samsung TV and my apps (Youtube and Amazon) take forever to load but not on the Tivo, its as smooth as changing channels. I was able to get every possible local channel but NBC which is frustrating but I assume has to do with where their tower is. I would gladly buy again am telling all my friends. Fix the setup process and it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shinn

customer_reviews.title: It takes a lot of persistence to get the system set up.
customer_reviews.text: The service and the equipment are excellent but the activation and service setup is frustrating. It took three days for Tivo to activate and get the service setup before I could access the channels. I tried about eight times over those three days rebooting the system several times and finally had to call Tivo. The connection at Tivo would go down when it looked for the service. This process is definitely not up to the current standard of other TV services.
customer_reviews.author: Wisk319

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price. I love mine!!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the TIVO! I have had 5 tivo's now, and love them all. This one was great because it included the lifetime subscription, which meant one price and done. I use it daily and have for a bit now. It works great. Very light weight and low power. The large hard drive has never gotten full yet. The only thing I would upgrade would be to go to a SSD for the drive, it would cut down a bit on the humming noise the hard drive makes.But I would highly recommend this or any TIVO product. They put a lot of quality in them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E Forney

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time looking at other products
customer_reviews.text: Here it is cord cutters. Don't waste your time looking at other products. This is what you are looking for. I have split the HDMI signal 8 times (PORITA) and now have recorded OTA DVR access everywhere in the house. RF controller and Iphone apps make controlling the TIVO simple for everyone in the house. We added the TIVO stream- old hardware but can now watch recorded content on just about every thing we own. Roamio OTA = no monthly charges EVER
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Guy

customer_reviews.title: Defective in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: Started freezing up less than 2 months after purchase. I couldn’t replay any recorded programs but it did resolve itself in about 24 hours. Now the buzzing sound is so loud I had to unplug it. I bought it so that I could record programs at night while I’m sleeping but can’t tolerate the noise so it’s currently unusable. I will be contacting TiVo and will update my review if they offer a resolution. I had recommended the unit to several coworkers but have since advised them against purchasing it unless TiVo offers to fix or replace the unit. The unit is not quite three months old.
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Very impressed and no monthly fees!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup and use. I'm very impressed with the interface and the best thing is no monthly fee. I can take it anywhere with no hookup fees. Just put up the antenna and connect to the internet. Commercial skip is great. I haven't tried the mobile app yet but plan to. Overall an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda done this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not do this years ago? I could have saved thousands of dollars. The TiVo Roamio OTA 1TB is a slick DVR and much more. I receive 148 over-the-air channels for free. And not only does it include built in apps for Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, HBO and YouTube (and others) but it searches all so that I don't need to go into each app individually to see which service has a particular title. Slick! Setup is easy and the performance is excellent. Now I'm ready to pick up a TiVo mini or two for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Marotta

customer_reviews.title: It only operates worse as time goes on
customer_reviews.text: i bought an extended warranty, the product functioned well for two months. I have called customer service on five different occasions after an hour for each call and going threw analysis , i was advised to try it again in the coming days and it should improve. It only operates worse as time goes on. it will not connect to wifi and will rarely record. I hope to hear from tivo or amazon for help
customer_reviews.author: Jolinn Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my satellite provider after I realized that 95% of what I was watching and recording came from my local stations. I had been running with the TiVo Roamio OTA 1 TB DVR for about three months just to make sure I had no regrets then I purchased the Mini. Couldn’t be happier. As a matter of fact, I am so happy with my decision to cut bait that I bought a second TiVo Roamio OTA. The cool thing about the Mini (and the Roamio can see the other Roamio) is they can see each other’s programming.
customer_reviews.author: Rod S.

customer_reviews.title: It all looked good, but when I went to watch the show ...
customer_reviews.text: Right now I'll give it the benefit of the doubt and say the jury is still out, but I'm extremely pissed off. I set up a OnePass recording for a show. Doubled checked on the evening of air to make sure that it was set to record. It all looked good, but when I went to watch the show it had recorded 9 seconds of the show. I'm furious. i really want this to work. I've sunk a fair amount of money into cutting the cord and I just want products to work as advertised. My VHS recorder could do this. What's so hard about recording a show that's been set up?
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Works with all HD antennas, you can Pause ...
customer_reviews.text: TiVo Works with all HD antennas, you can Pause live TV and record your free over-the-air channels, Record up to 4 shows at once, Search TV and streaming content in a single click, and skip commercials with a single click.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bowling

customer_reviews.title: great product, recommend to all
customer_reviews.text: great product, recommend to all. One thing- this machine is factory set to automatically record ALL of Tivos "recommendations", based on what you watch. I was not aware of this at first, but noticed a lot of recording going on. I thought another family member set the machine to record, but then realized not. I did not know about this dubious feature until over 100 recordings had been made, then had to go through the online manual to see how to turn this off. Then had to manually delete all of them! Another example of having to opt out of something, instead of opting in! Except for this glitch, I am very pleased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Device!
customer_reviews.text: This might be the coolest TV-related electronic device I've ever had. It's very intuitive and easy to use, and the quality is excellent. It's nice to know as I'm watching something on a DVR that I own that I'm no longer shoveling money into the pockets of DirecTV or Comcast. And since this comes with no monthly service fees, once I've paid for it with my 2 months of savings by not having DirecTV, I will no longer have any monthly bill associated with watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Z. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Super product!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve ever had another product that works as well as this one is advertised. Ease-of-use and quality exceed my expectations. The only way to go OTA ! The fact that it came with the schedule and I can go out to the future or back to the past was unexpected but a great benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've had it for 2 years now and have saved about $2,400 by purchasing this OTA TiVo and a Clearstream 2 antenna along with an amplifier. It seems to struggle with the MLBtv app but, Hulu has been working great lately. Occasionally, I'll have reception issues but that's rarely a problem even here in Florida. I really don't have any negative comments. This TiVo is essential for making the cord cutting process as easy as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Prognosis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, could have been executed better.
customer_reviews.text: Generally pretty good. Remote seems to sometimes register extra clicks, some as additional clicks with a button you just pressed, sometimes with a different button. It can be pretty annoying and it doesn't happen with my universal remote. The one-pass feature sounds great, but even if you set it to exclude subscription and rentals it will often come up with rental and subscription only seasons of your shows. Speaking of streaming shows, it won't keep track of the episodes you have already seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W. L.

customer_reviews.title: RIP-OFF!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased. The machine dies almost exactly 1 year after purchasing! So much for lifetime service. This is a HUGE scam! I will never purchase another - at least not here!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY BELL

product_meta.title: TiVo Roamio OTA 1 TB DVR - With No Monthly Service Fees - Digital Video Recorder and Streaming Media Player
product_meta.description:
TiVo Roamio OTA. The premium TV experience without the premium price.

Cutting the cord? The TiVo Roamio OTA was built for those looking for a full-throttled entertainment experience without cable or satellite. It works with any HD antenna, delivers 1 terabyte of recording capacity (up to 150 HD hours of HD programming) and integrates all your streaming content from Netflix, Amazon Prime, HULU, YouTube, Pandora and more.(4) Best of all, it’s now available without a monthly TiVo service fee. Without those hefty monthly TV bills—and with TiVo service included in your purchase price—TiVo Roamio OTA is the most economical premium TV experience available anywhere. Kindly enter your zip-code in the following link https://www.fcc.gov/media/engineering/dtvmaps to check the available TV reception in your locality.
feature_bullets: Compatible only with HDTV Antennas. Does not work with cable or satellite TV. No monthly TiVo service fee required.
Record four shows at once and up to 150 hours of HD programming. Pause, rewind and record free HD programming.
SkipMode skips entire commercial breaks of recorded shows at the press of a button. QuickMode speeds through recorded and buffered shows 30% faster, with pitch-corrected audio.
Searches TV and streaming content simultaneously. Integrates access to Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, VUDU and more.
Over-the-air reception varies widely by location, and is affected by surroundings, distance from transmitter, terrain, and availability of local channels.Power: 12V

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,282 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
